description: <p>DivorceCare is a safe place where caring people come alongside you as you find healing from the pain of separation or divorce.  You will find helpful information and tools to walk through this life changing event.</p>
extra_classes: time_start time_end image event_time event_location contact_email
title: DivorceCare

description: <p>GriefShare provides a safe place to join others who understand the emotions and pain of loss.  In this community you will find peace, comfort and the resources to move forward in life.  You don't have to suffer through grieving alone.</p>
extra_classes: time_start time_end image event_time event_location contact_email
title: GriefShare

extra_classes: image event_location contact_email
title: High School Winter Camp

description: <p>Do you want to understand and live in your identity as a child of God?  To experience a lasting life-change and freedom?  This course does not focus on how to <em>behave</em> but on how to <em>believe. </em>You will learn to replace the lies you might believe about yourself with the truth of God's word. Develop spiritual maturity, resolve personal and spiritual conflicts, renew your mind and break free from negative thinking and unhelpful patterns of behavior.</p>
extra_classes: time_start time_end image event_time event_location contact_email
title: Freedom in Christ

text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -moz-text-size-adjust: auto; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration: none;">th</sup><span style="caret-color: #000000; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -moz-text-size-adjust: auto; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration: none;">th</sup><span style="caret-color: #000000; font-style: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -moz-text-size-adjust: auto; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration: none; display: inline !important; float: none;">, & 7</span><sup style="caret-color: #000000; font-style: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; -moz-text-size-adjust: auto; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration: none;">th</sup><span style="caret-color: #000000; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration: none; display: inline !important; float: none;"> graders (2023-24 school year).  Students will enjoy a fun-filled, high energy morning of wild games, competition, worship, and small groups as they grow in relationship with one another, their leaders, and most importantly Jesus! Camp is Monday - Thursday, at the Lakeline Location concluding with a Friday evening celebration. Registration can be found here when it opens.</span></span></p>

title: Xtreme Adventure
